Name: Barrica
Review Text: I‚Äôve been wanting to go here for a while and it was well worth the wait! A really lovely restaurant and bar with amazing service and the food was delicious! A must-go but you absolutely have to book in advance as it‚Äôs got limited seating and very popular.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Really nice place for good food and wine with friends. Make reservations, it's often fully booked.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Nice ambiance, some interesting wine & good tapas. Great for any evening

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Very nice decorated tapas like wine bar. Wine menu available as a label on a magnum size wine bottle. Variety of spanish wine and cava available. Good food to accompany their wine selection. They also serve one type of a beer. Try their hot flatbread with delicious greens, tomatoes and eggplant.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great Pizza, beautiful environment and nice service!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Excellent food, great service. A must visit, at least once, when in Amsterdam!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Good choice of wines and exquisite tapas to go along. It's more a tapas bar than a place for dinner, so good for sharing with friends and trying out different tastes. You can spend a pleasant evening here.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: First dining out experience since COVID 19 restrictions. Barrica followed safety guidelines and provided warm service. Oysters and mignionette were delicious! The pizza came out at the perfect temperature and the ingredients on the pizza were fresh. Thank you for a lovely experience!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great service, food and wine. Lovely little terrace in our neighbourhood.

Name: Barrica
Review Text:
Stop seeking, because Barrica is a hidden gem in Amsterdam-West.
Me and my girlfriend had a wonderful evening. We are quite picky if it comes to good food and service, which is not a common thing in Amsterdam... ‚Ä¶

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great place, great food. Loved it!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Nice wines, good snacks but not good menu for a real dinner. Place a little bit posh indeed. Prices for the wine are reasonable, but the food is WAY too much for the quality/complexity of the dishes. I would be back only for some glasses of wine after having dinner in another place nearby.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Perfect for a date! Staff is friendly and food is brilliant! Lots of good wine, definitely a must! Really good in the summer, they have a cozy outdoor seating.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Low your expectations if you know bout Spanish food because even although the menu seems to follow that kitchen the taste and looks is VERY far away. Prices are quite high for the quality of the products. The ambience is young and a bit ‚Ä¶

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Our local go to cozy wine bar. Great service, good wine and nice little tapas. It gets busy so either go early or book if you can.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Lovely food and friendly staff, wine was great too. It took a while to get served but understandable cos they were so busy. Can't fault the place

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great pizza, nice vibe and service!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: We were 4 of us, ordered 3 bottles of red wine and a bottle of cava plus so many dishes!! They were all delicious and I really love the vibe of this place! It was around 65 euros per person :) but well worth it and definitely coming back !!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Nice little place, good atmosphere, good dishes (Spanish/Italian). Burger was juicy. Portions are not huge but it is easy to order more if you run out of good stuff

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Gem! Probably among the best little spots in Amsterdam, especially for us the more..southern people! Ambience, food, people, wine.. all fantastic, happy to have lived around the corner!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: The pizza was only ok, one topping was missing. It was compensated though, and the waitresses were really nice and friendly.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Not a real Spanish nor an Italian place. Inflated prices and small portions. Small place with loud dutch clientele. Waiters are nice and friendly guys btw

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Good wine and great foccacia!

Name: Barrica
Review Text:
Nice place, ambiance and music.

Food is nice, but way too expensive (like times two) for the 'shareable dishes' you get.. Service is not the best, they serve you, but that's it.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Excellent wine bar with very tasty food. Tasteful decor with different dining options (bar/long table/small tables/seats)

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great bites, good wines. People are friendly. Sitting outside with the nice weather is a definite plus!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great tapas style food, huge selection of wines, cosy decor and nice staff

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Nice place and vibe, good food and wines and very friendly staff. Really nice place to go on a date üëåüèª.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Nice pizza but it made our stomache burn. Quick service. Unfriendly staff.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: More than just another wine bar in town; this one is definitely worth a visit!

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Great wines, good food. Pricing of the food relatively high looking at the portions

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Most friendly people in the whole city of Amsterdam! Good food and a decent wine list

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Good spot for a tapas style dinner with wine! Outside and inside sitting area.

Name: Barrica
Review Text: Good food & nice atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit!

Name: Barrica

Review Text: Great food! Great service and really nice wines.

Name: Barrica
